strength.description: Indicates a character's lifting ability and base HTH damage

dexterity.description: Determines who acts first in combat and provides DEX-based Skill Rolls

constitution.description: Determines if a character is Stunned in combat and provides CON Rolls

intelligence.description: Provides Perception Rolls and INT-based Skill Rolls

ego.description: Determines character's resistance to most Mental Powers, provides EGO Rolls

presence.description: Allows character to make Presence Attacks, provides PRE-based Skill Rolls

offensiveCombatValue.description: Indicates the character's accuracy in combat

defensiveCombatValue.description: Indicates how hard it is to hit the character in combat

offensiveMentalCombatValue.description: Indicates the character's accuracy in Mental combat

defensiveMentalCombatValue.description: Indicates how hard it is to hit the character in Mental combat

speed.description: Determines how frequently the character gets to act in each Turn of combat

physicalDefense.description: Protects the character from Physical attacks (such as punches and clubs)

energyDefense.description: Protects the character from Energy attacks (such as fire and lasers)

recovery.description: Indicates how quickly the character recovers from being Knocked Out or injured

endurance.description: The "personal energy" that "fuels" many abilities and powers

body.description: Indicates how hard it is to kill the character

stun.description: Indicates how hard it is to Knock Out the character
